english.segment1: We ain't got no place to go. So let's go to the punk rock show. Darling take me by the hand. We're gonna see a punk rawk band. There's no use in tv shows. Radio or rodeos. I wanna get into the crowd. I wanna hear it played real loud. Ain't go no money to pay. We'll get in anyway doesn't matter I don't care. It's fell good so we should share. We're going to the punk rawk show! oooohh!! ooohh!!.
